Normal Tag only Indoor C-Mode Caution! You have made changes. Do you want to upload instead of discarding them? Upload Discard & download Back (don\'t do anything) Could not upload Some or all the data was not uploaded. Try again later. The API responded with an error, please save your data and report the issue:\n\n Upload conflict %1$s \nhas local version %2$d \nand the server %3$d %1$s \nhas local version %2$d \nand was deleted on the server %1$s \nwas deleted locally \nbut has references on the server %1$s \nwas already deleted on the server Use local version Use version on server Could not authenticate If you are using OAuth this is likely a bug, please send a problem report, if you are using login and password (not recommended), please check that they are entered correctly. No connection to server Could not connect to the OSM server now. Please check that you are connected to the Internet, or try again later. Could not connect to the OSM server because HTTPS negotiation failed. Try switching to a non-encrypted connection in the API preferences. Could not authenticate If you are using OAuth, re-authenticate and try again. If you are using login and password (not recommended), please check that they are entered correctly. Re-authenticate Login forbidden Element not found The API couldn\'t find an existing element or changeset with the specified id.

Unknown error The error code returned from the API or the message could not be processed.

No data The configured data source has no coverage here. Missing or disabled component This feature depends on a missing or disabled system component. Go to openstreetmap.org Version conflict Data from the download would conflict with your edits. Please upload your data before trying again. Invalid bounding box The selected area does not conform to API restrictions, please choose a different one. Download area too large The area you are trying to download is too large or contains too much data.\n\nPlease zoom in farther and try again. API offline The API is currently offline, no data can be retrieved or written. Out of memory Vespucci could not load the requested data. Please start again and load a smaller area. Vespucci could not load the requested data. Please save your edits, start again, and load a smaller area. Invalid data received If you didn\'t cause the error, please file a bug report. Invalid data read Please consult the documentation on supported file formats and required data fields. Could not write to file Vespucci could not change or save the file. Applying the OSC file failed Most likely you have not loaded all the original data that is required to apply the changes. Welcome Thank you for installing Vespucci.\n

To get started you need to know three things:\n
  • tapping the lock icon in the upper left corner will switch between locked (no editing) and unlocked mode,
  • to edit OpenStreetMap you need to download the data for the area where you want to change something first (zoom in before attempting that),
  • to add a new object: tap the large green button and select what you want to add, then tap the position you want to locate it at.
\nYou are all set to go now. Start mapping and have fun! \n

Your device has \"soft keys\" that are hidden from view. Swipe from the bottom to show them again. Read the introduction This is a new Vespucci version New features and behaviour are detailed in the release notes. Save to Existing GPX track data You already have existing GPX track data. You may want to cancel and save first. Really delete all tags for \"%1$s\" object? Enter JavaScript here Output will appear here Validator ruleset %1$s Re-survey Edit re-survey entry Add re-survey entry Check Edit check entry Add check entry Max. age Age Require\noptional Require optional Add re-survey entry Add check entry Empty relation The %1$s relation has no members.\n\nLeaving it as is will make it non-editable in Vespucci. Add members Leave empty GPX waypoint WPT: %1$s Description Created Altitude Create OSM object Create OSM object from preset search Custom imagery OAM imagery Edit layer entry Add layer entry Overlay Coverage Top Left Right Bottom Invalid or incomplete bounding box Delete layer? Layer style Stroke width Colour Label JSON object (not displayed) JSON array (not displayed) GeoJSON Grid GPX Photos Tasks OSM data %1$s data Flush tile cache Change style Select imagery All Aerial imagery Outdated aerial imagery Map Outdated map OSM based map QA Other Min zoom Max zoom Start date End date Terms Privacy policy Delete photo Delete permamently Go to photo Bounding box Last included date Attribution MapSplit read only source Checkpoints Undo - redo Just selected checkpoint (unsafe) Undo all later checkpoints (safe) Redo all earlier checkpoints (safe) Undo location is not in view The location that will be affected by the undo is not in view. Undo anyway Zoom to location, then undo Send with your OpenStreetMap display name OpenStreetMap display name not retrieved yet Feedback for the developers Download OpenStreetMap data Stop tracking and delete any stored trackpoints. This cannot be undone. Did you know? Stop showing optional tips Long pressing the undo button will show all undo and redo checkpoints. Background and overlay layers are provided by third parties. Using a layer transmits your network address and a rough indication of the area you are looking at to the provider.

If the provider has supplied privacy policy information, you can view it with the \"Info\" menu item in the layer dialog. Pan and zoom auto download should be used with caution as it has the potential to severely tax both the OpenStreetMap APIs and your device.

The load on the API servers can be avoided by using an offline data source. In locked mode you can\'t edit, but a long press on an object will open a display with detailed information. + - 1 Vespucci default Default notification channel Vespucci QA QA alert channel for data problems and tasks Permission denied %1$s Pick a name Enter a URL Set minimum zoom lower than maximum You have not changed anything yet… Upload your unsaved changes first. Clear anyway? Uploaded to OSM server. Please zoom in to edit (Volume ↑/↓ or lens/shift) Unlock to edit Saved Could not save Could not export Exported to %1$s Note - preset overwrote tag(s) Note - operation overwrote tag(s) This preset can\'t be auto-applied You reversed a oneway street or a way with directionally dependent tags. Please check the tags and correct them if needed. You merged elements with conflicting tag values, direction dependent semantics or different roles in the same relation. Please check the tags and roles and correct them if needed. You are trying to merge elements with conflicting tag values.\n\nPlease check the tags and correct them before trying again. Unreadable or corrupt state file %1$d nodes in moved way You have an unread OSM message You have %1$d unread OSM messages Read Started scan for geo-referenced photos Finished scan for geo-referenced photos Download failed with error code %1$d, message %2$s Unsurveyed road Road lacks name or ref Relation lacks type Untagged way Untagged relation Node is near element it could be connected to Degenerate way Try uploading again after allowing OAuth access to your OSM account. Please allow OAuth access to your OSM account. No OAuth configuration available for current API, please set login and password. OAuth is not enabled for the current API. Timeout during authentication handshake, please try again. Communication error during authentication handshake, please try again. Could not carry out OAuth handshake: %1$s Timeout from server Longitude must be within -180°/+180°, latitude within -85°/85° Nothing found Could not save current state!\nThis a fatal error, trying to write an export file for later recovery with JOSM. Please install a file manager. Download more data to edit this area. %1$s not found. Imported %1$d GPX track points and 1 way point. Imported %1$d GPX track points and %2$d way points. Sorry, currently \"%1$s\" is not understood Inconsistent state detected, please send in the error report. Could not start camera app: %1$s No voice recognition facility present %1$s is not writeable by Vespucci.\nThis may be insufficient permissions or a technical issue with your device. The system did not return a suitable location for the tile database. At least one preset has to be selected! At least one geocoder has to be selected! Corrupted state file, used backup file instead. Corrupted bug state file, used backup file instead. Splitted \"from\" way Splitted \"via\" way Splitted \"from\" and \"via\" ways Splitted \"to\" way Tile database issue Serious issue with map tile database\n"%1$s"\nPlease consult our FAQ at https://vespucci.io/ Invalid API URL Invalid ReadOnly API URL Invalid notes API URL Invalid preset URL Invalid regular expression in filter with key="%1$s" value="%2$s" Can\'t access photo %1$s Not allowed to access photo %1$s Voice recognition facility missing %1$s has no coverage here %1$s file exists. Illegal operation: %1$s Could not create the preset "%1$s": %2$s Missing imperial units Could not connect to server: %1$s This will flush all tile caches! Image offset applied. Unsupported format: %1$s Returning %1$d of %2$d found entries Not a MBTiles format file Using network location Using GPS/GNSS location GPS/GNSS positioning turned off, GPX tracking stopped Remote NMEA connection from/to %1$s Remote NMEA connection closed Tags copied to clipboard Tags cut to clipboard Properties copied to clipboard %1$s has changed on the server, upload first and then re-download Only new Notes can be moved Task layer disabled Unable to create task layer Merged Long press is not available in simple mode Invalid style file format for %1$s No geometry for element found Added API entry for %1$s Updated %1$s Cannot resume download of %1$s Device not found for %1$s File %1$s already exists File error for %1$s HTTP data error for %1$s Not enough space on device for %1$s Too many redirects for %1$s Unhandled HTTP code for %1$s Unknown error for %1$s Download of %1$s started Phone number reformatted Some relation members are not downloaded You need to restart Vespucci for the change to take effect Unable to open offline data %1$s %2$s MapSplit sources must have min and max zoom set Version information missing in PBF file Unknown relation member type %1$s Yes No OK Cancel Dismiss Done Locked Next Apply Set Replace Save Save and set Back Forward Keep Enable Disable Clear Discard Retry Prune Check Read Overwrite Share Share position Share on OpenStreetMap Min. Please insert decimal formatted coordinates (e.g. "52.333572","8.741185"). Lat. has to lay between -85.0 and +85.0, and Lon. has to lay between -175.0 and +175.0. %2$d %1$.2f meter %1$.3f km Layers… Load GeoJSON layer Add background imagery layer Add overlay imagery layer Add task layer Add grid Add photo layer Configure… Apply stored offset to imagery Contrast Reset OAuth Authorise OAuth Tag filter Preset filter Include way nodes Invert filters Properties History Join Reverse This way is unreversible due to being tagged with directionally dependent attributes. Reversing it would break the tagging. Reverse anyway You are about to delete a way.\n\nYou can either keep all nodes, or delete those that only belong to this way and are tagless. You are about to delete a way that is a member of one or more relations. Removing any way carrying such relations may render it invalid. The way contains nodes outside of the downloaded area and cannot be deleted without creating an inconsistent state. Download all of it before trying again. Only delete way Delete way You are about to delete a node that is a member of one or more relations. Removing any node carrying such relations may render it invalid. Delete node Split … … all ways Merge with … … all nearby ways … all nearby nodes Deleting the note cannot be undone! Delete note Way selected Node selected Relation selected Creating path Multiselect New Note selected Split closed way, 1st node Split closed way, 2nd node Add turn restriction Re-select \"from\" segment Select \"from\" segment Add \"via\" segment/element Re-select \"via\" segment Add \"to\" segment Re-select \"to\" segment Split \"from\" segment Split \"via\" segment 1 object %1$d objects Rotate way Add node Tap the screen position Add tagged node Add way Tap the screen position Add map note Tap the screen position Paste object Tap the screen position Paste multiple times Tap the screen position Map background The tile based map background. Map overlay The tile based map overlay. Custom layers Configure layers not in the default configuration. Scale display Type of scale displayed on the map. Data style Choose the style for the data layer. Display tasks Display, edit and create notes, bugs and tasks. Enable photo layer Display geo-referenced photos. Keep screen on Prevent screen from turning off to save power. Large node drag area Provide large area for dragging nodes. Advanced preferences More settings… Presets Add and enable JOSM compatible presets Built-in preset Validator settings Configure the validation rules. Connected node tolerance If a highway end node is within this distance (in meters) of a highway it should be connected to it Opening hours templates Load, save and delete opening hours templates Authors and licenses Debug About User interface settings Layout and display configuration options. Show node icons Show the icon of the best-matching preset above nodes. Show POI icons on buildings Show the icon of best-matching preset above buildings. Display tag form Display tag form for editing. Show camera action Show camera icon on action bar. Use builtin photo viewer Use the builtin photo view, if not checked an external viewer will be used. Follow position button layout Where the "follow position" button will be positioned. Always dim non-downloaded areas Dims non-downloaded areas in locked mode. Fullscreen mode Behaviour on devices with "soft" keys. Map screen orientation Behaviour of the map screen on device orientation changes. Show tolerance Displays area where an element can be selected. Use ← key to undo Use the ← key to undo in main edit view. Light theme Light and white backgrounds. Enable split action bar Allow split action bar, use is device specific. Requires starting Vespucci again, and Android 4.0 or later. Max. number of inline values Maximum number of inline values displayed in tag form. %1$d Values Time to wait before auto-locking Amount of seconds to wait before auto-locking, 0 turns it off. %1$d s Enable anti-aliasing Makes the lines smoother. Enable hardware acceleration Allows use of hardware acceleration if and where supported, currently setting this has no effect. Max line width Do not draw a way thicker than this. %1$d px Pending upload OK Limit below which pending object uploads will be considered OK %1$d objects Pending upload warning Limit below which pending object uploads will have warning status Data and edit settings Auto-download, saving and notification settings. Always use contextual menu Always show the contextual menu if a selection is ambiguous. Address tags Tags used for address prediction. Enable name suggestions Turn on suggestions for the name tag. Enable name suggestion presets Automatically add preset when name suggestion is selected. Enable auto-apply of preset Automatically apply preset when starting the property editor. Generate notifications Generate notifications for data with problems or notes Group alerts only Only generate alerts (audio) for groups of notifications once Max. number of displayed notifications Maximum number of displayed notifications per type (min. 1). %1$d Notifications Max distance for notifications The farthest distance a problem or note can be from the current position to generate a notification. %1$d meter(s) Close changesets Close changesets by default upon saving. Enable auto-preset generation Allow generation of presets from taginfo. Squaring threshold The threshold in ° over which angles are ignored %1$d° Auto-format phone numbers Enable automaic formatting of phone numbers Auto-download settings Settings for data and task auto downloading Download radius Radius (m) of externally triggered downloads, 0 centers only on map. %1$d meter(s) Maximum auto-download speed Limit (in km/h) above which auto-download is suspended. %1$d km/h Auto-prune limit Number of Nodes in memory that when reached will trigger a prune. %1$d Nodes Zoom limit Minimum zoom level for pan and zoom auto-download. %1$d Task filter Select which elements are displayed on the notes, bugs and task layer. Task download radius Radius (m) of task downloads. Maximum task auto-download speed Limit (in km/h) above which notes, bugs and task auto-download is suspended. Location settings GPS/GNSS parameters and other location providers. GPS/GNSS source Source of GPS/GNSS location updates. NMEA network source Address of TCP NMEA source as host:port. Minimum GPS/GNSS interval The minimum time interval for GPS/GNSS location notifications, in milliseconds. Lower values drain more battery. %1$d ms Minimum GPS/GNSS-distance The minimum distance between for GPS/GNSS notifications, in meters. Lower values drain more battery. %1$d meter(s) Leave GPS/GNSS turned off Don\'t ask to turn GPS/GNSS on if off. Fallback to network location If no GPS/GNSS positioning is present or turned on, fall back to network provider. Stale location after The age (in seconds) that a location needs to have to be considered stale. %1$d s Server settings OSM API and configuration of other servers. OSM API URL You can set a non-standard API URL here. Should usually not be changed! User account You only need configuration to upload OSM data if not using OAuth. Get an account at https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/new Offset server URL for the imagery offset server. OSMOSE server URL for the OSMOSE server. Configure geocoders Add, edit, delete geocoders for the search functionality. Layer download and storage Tile-based background imagery download and storage. Max. number of download threads Maximum number of threads for downloading tiles. %1$d Threads Tile cache size Total storage used for caching tiles, in MB. %1$d MB Miscellaneous Report app crashes Crash reporting turned on Crash reporting turned off Show stats Displays data stats and FPS in the lower left corner. Experimental Enable JS console Make the JS console available in "live" mode. Enable voice commands Enable voice command support. Manage APIs API URL Use OAuth Enable OAuth OSM username OSM password Do not mistake it for the wiki password. Remember: It is stored and transmitted in plaintext! Manage presets Use translations Manage geocoders Update preset Preset downloaded Could not download preset file. The preset will not work. The preset file is invalid. The preset will not work. Preset file downloaded. However, some missing icons were not. Preset downloader Add preset This preset already exists Preset downloaded. An API with this URL already exists. However, you may add another one (e.g. to switch accounts easily). Add API The configuration URL does not contain valid data. Add geocoder API name API URL Read-only API URL (optional) Notes API URL (optional) Copy of %1$s Add Edit Delete Name URL Default Regular expression State No entries Geocoder type Preset API Undo Redo nothing to undo Vespucci background service Background service active Recording a GPS track or auto-downloading Vespucci is recording a GPX track or auto-downloading. To completly exit press the button below or the back button in the app. Failed to enable GPS Address %1$s Address %1$s %2$s Node moved Way moved Objects moved Insertion Append to way Node deletion Way deletion Objects deleted Ways split Way split Way merging Way reversal Tagging Joining Way separation Relation creation Relation deletion Relation update Cut Paste Way rotation Way squaring Arrange in circule Conflict resolution Node extraction Apply OSC file Remove node from way Vespucci crashed or encountered a serious issue the last time it ran.\n\nPlease help by clicking by \'OK\' to send an error report.\n Add any further info you believe might help and (optionally,) your OSM user name if you want feedback.\n\nThank you. Reported. Could not send report. This operation would create a way with too many nodes. OSM data issue detected Nearby OSM note detected Nearby OSM bug detected in %1$d m %2$s NE ↗ E → SE ↘ S ↓ SW ↙ W ← NW ↖ N ↑ Role Role Member of relation Relation Relations Position Type Object You are about to delete a relation that is a member of one or more relations. Removing any such relation from such relations may render it invalid. Delete relation You are about to delete this element from a relation.
